entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
